call.[/nectar_icon_list_item][nectar_icon_list_item icon_type=”numerical” text_full_html=”html” title=”List Item” id=”1677101336847-1″ tab_id=”1677101336847-8″ header=”Principal’s office informative id=”1677101336861-7″ tab_id=”1677101336862-7″ header=”Document gathering”]In-hand application form’s purchase in Campus to be filled in with the candidate’s family information as well as required documents’ gathering.[/nectar_icon_list_item][nectar_icon_list_item icon_type=”numerical” text_full_html=”html” title=”List Item” id=”1677101336875-3″ tab_id=”1677101336876-5″ header=”Candidate’s family interview”]Candidate’s family interview and entrance tests to be carried out by the psychopedagogy office[/nectar_icon_list_item][nectar_icon_list_item icon_type=”numerical” text_full_html=”html” title=”List Item” id=”1677101336884-0″ tab_id=”1677101336884-2″ header=”Admissions Committee”]Admissions Committee on candidate’s results analysis in order to decide whether to grant or not the applicant’s intentions.[/nectar_icon_list_item][nectar_icon_list_item icon_type=”numerical” text_full_html=”html” title=”List Item” id=”1677101336900-6″ tab_id=”1677101336900-3″ header=”Admissions’ results”]Admissions’ results deliverance to the candidate’s family via phone call or email.[/nectar_icon_list_item][nectar_icon_list_item icon_type=”numerical” text_full_html=”html” title=”List Item” id=”1677101336915-6″ tab_id=”1677101336915-6″ header=”Pre-registration agreement”]Pre-registration agreement with the family providing the candidate’s former school runs on A- type calendar.[/nectar_icon_list_item][nectar_icon_list_item icon_type=”numerical” text_full_html=”html” title=”List Item” id=”1677101336929-3″ tab_id=”1677101336930-7″ header=”Tuition payments”]Tuition payments proceed to be made in Campus[/nectar_icon_list_item][nectar_icon_list_item icon_type=”numerical” text_full_html=”html” title=”List Item” id=”1677101336944-5″ tab_id=”1677101336945-1″ header=”Registration signing”]Registration signing once all the aforementioned steps have been completed.[/nectar_icon_list_item][nectar_icon_list_item icon_type=”numerical” text_full_html=”html” title=”List Item” id=”1677101336955-5″ tab_id=”1677101336956-6″ header=”Welcoming meeting”]Welcoming meeting to present school’s educational policy, values and formative
